line_1: Few days, few years, perhaps few moments urge
line_2: My footsteps to the dreary verge,

line_1: The daemons with curses her steps onward urge;
line_2: Her shoulders with whips form'd of serpents they scourge,

line_1: May to the grave its victim urge, —
line_2: Decides how near the mangling scourge

line_1: Clouds follow clouds, and mountains mountains urge;
line_2: Onward resistless rolls the infuriate surge,

line_1: Turn the broad helm, the fluttering canvas urge
Mix with broad vans, with shadowy tridents urge.
line_2: YOU form with chemic hands the airy surge,

line_1: Wide-waving fins round floating islands urge
line_2: His bulk gigantic through the troubled surge;

line_1: She bade no wretch his thankless labour urge,
line_2: Nor, trembling, take the pittance and the scourge!
Shall I become a nation's scourge,

line_1: That still my lawful suit in vain I urge,
line_2: And still yon caitiff mocks the avenging scourge!
